## Mapping in R

```{r Load_Libraries,echo=FALSE,warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}
library(leaflet)
```



# This shows the map of a certain location

```{r Maps,echo=FALSE,warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}
leaflet() %>% 
  addTiles() %>% 
  addMarkers(lng = 7.376,lat = 5.230)
```
